CatalogIdString.description: A string representing the Catalog Id.

NameString.description: A string representing a resource's name.

RowFilter.description: An object representing the Data Cells Filter's Row Filter. Either a Filter Expression or a Wildcard is required.

properties.name: AllRowsWildcard
properties.description: An empty object representing a row wildcard.

type.description: An empty object representing a row wildcard.

ColumnWildcard.description: An object representing the Data Cells Filter's Columns. Either Column Names or a Wildcard is required.

properties.name: ExcludedColumnNames
properties.description: A list of column names to be excluded from the Data Cells Filter.

type.description: A list of column names to be excluded from the Data Cells Filter.

resource.description: A resource schema representing a Lake Formation Data Cells Filter.

properties.name: TableCatalogId
properties.description: The Catalog Id of the Table on which to create a Data Cells Filter.

type.description: The Catalog Id of the Table on which to create a Data Cells Filter.

properties.name: DatabaseName
properties.description: The name of the Database that the Table resides in.

type.description: The name of the Database that the Table resides in.

properties.name: TableName
properties.description: The name of the Table to create a Data Cells Filter for.

type.description: The name of the Table to create a Data Cells Filter for.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The desired name of the Data Cells Filter.

type.description: The desired name of the Data Cells Filter.

properties.name: RowFilter
properties.description: An object representing the Data Cells Filter's Row Filter. Either a Filter Expression or a Wildcard is required

type.description: An object representing the Data Cells Filter's Row Filter. Either a Filter Expression or a Wildcard is required

properties.name: ColumnNames
properties.description: A list of columns to be included in this Data Cells Filter.

type.description: A list of columns to be included in this Data Cells Filter.

properties.name: ColumnWildcard
properties.description: An object representing the Data Cells Filter's Columns. Either Column Names or a Wildcard is required

type.description: An object representing the Data Cells Filter's Columns. Either Column Names or a Wildcard is required
